name: D.A.: Pursuit of Justice - The Rat Tattoo Murder
name_original: D.A.: Pursuit of Justice - The Rat Tattoo Murder
description:
D.A.: Pursuit of Justice - The Rat Tattoo Murder is an adventure game developed by Legacy Interactive. It came out on 01-10-2001. Legacy Interactive published the game.
D.A.: Pursuit of Justice - The Rat Tattoo Murder is available on PC.
